title: Folder Permission Fix
description: Resolve 'Access Denied' or 'Permission Required' errors for shared folders.

steps.title: Check Network Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure you are connected to the company network or VPN to access shared network drives.

steps.title: Verify Path
steps.instruction: Ensure the folder path is correct and hasn't been moved or renamed by another user.

steps.title: Check Inherited Permissions
steps.instruction: Right-click folder → Properties → Security → Advanced. Check if your user group is listed.

steps.title: Reconnect Network Drive
steps.instruction: Disconnect the network drive (Z:, P:, etc.) and remap it using the full server path.

steps.title: Request IT Access
steps.instruction: If all fails, your access may have expired. Provide the folder path to IT to request a renewal.
